\section{Research Interests}
Computational Imaging, Computer Vision, machine learning, scientific computing, physics-based modeling and simulation.

\item \textit{Applied Math, Eng., \& Physics. Advisor: Dan Negrut}. Senior Project: "Modeling and simulation of fluid-solid interaction problems on distributed memory architectures using the Charm++ parallel programming paradigm"
\item \textit{Computer Sciences. Advisor: Vikas Singh}. Thesis: "Accelerating Permutation Testing in Neuroimaging through Subspace Tracking"
\end{itemize}}  % arguments 3 to 6 can be left empty

\section{Selected Positions}
\subsection{\textbf{Academic/Research}}
\cventry{2016--present}{UW-Madison, Research Assistant, Computer Vision Group}{Madison, WI}{}{}{
\begin{itemize}
	\item Investigate optimal modulation and demodulation waveforms for Correlation-based Time of Flight Imaging.
\end{itemize}}

\cventry{2015--2016}{UW-Madison, Research Assistant, Wisconsin ADRC Imaging Group}{Madison, WI}{}{}{
\begin{itemize}
	\item Developed RapidPT, an open-source MATLAB toolbox that accelerates permutation testing in neuroimaging by leveraging low-rank matrix completion.
\end{itemize}}
\cventry{2013--2016}{UW-Madison, Research Assistant, Simulation-Based Engineering Lab}{Madison, WI}{}{}{
\begin{itemize}
	\item Investigated and implemented parallel programming techniques and technologies to develop a distributed memory fluid-solid interaction engine.
	\item Developed the full-stack of a web app that records and displays the performance and testing metrics of \textit{Chrono}.
	\item Developed web-based and scripting tools for pre/post processing tasks such as: model setup and rendering.
\end{itemize}}

\subsection{\textbf{Teaching}}
\cventry{Spring 2017}{UW-Madison, Computer Vision Teaching Assistant}{Madison, WI}{}{}{}
\cventry{Fall 2016}{UW-Madison, Project Assistant, PEOPLE Program}{Madison, WI}{}{}{
\begin{itemize}
	\item Math, Science, and World Languages Academic Lead at James Madison Memorial High School.
\end{itemize}}

\subsection{\textbf{Industry}}
\cventry{Summer 2016}{Cray Inc, Intern, Performance Team}{St Paul, MN}{}{}{\begin{itemize}
	\item Contributed to the shared, distributed, and hybrid implementations of a bioinformatics application, and evaluated their performance on various many-core architectures.	
\end{itemize} }
\cventry{Summer 2014}{Microsoft Corporation, Intern, Maps App Team}{Seattle, WA}{}{}{
\begin{itemize}
	\item Developed the desktop, phone and tablet UX that allows Maps app users to interact with the available layers. 
\end{itemize} }
